definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: Mature woman refelects on herself the moment she discovers her husband has an extramarital affair.
sentences.chinese: 成熟的女人在發現丈夫有婚外戀的首先自我反省。

sentences.english: Are you having an affair with Brooke Windham?
sentences.chinese: 你和布洛基雲漢夫人有婚外戀嗎？

sentences.english: How do you comment on the whole section about Princess Diana's affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼評論那整版的黛妃的婚外戀記事？

sentences.english: In a sense, extramarital love results from lack of responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 從某種意義上說，婚外戀緣於責任感缺乏。

sentences.english: A:How do you comment on the whole section about Princess Diana's affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼評論那整版的黛妃的婚外戀記事？

sentences.english: I think all extramarital love is the outcome of greed.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲一切婚外戀都是貪慾的產物。

sentences.english: Kilpatrick and Betty appears in court to deny that afterward has the adulterous love affair.
sentences.chinese: 基爾帕特里克和貝蒂隨後出庭否認發生婚外戀。

definition: the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement
loss of love/breakup of a relationship
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
